quotes.quote: And so we presently hear, in the year 1638, of a start being made in British Honduras by a small company of shipwrecked British sailors who maintained themselves in this, at that time, unoccupied country by hunting the manatee, the original of the mermaid of romance, and soon settled down to cut and export logwood. Logwood at its best rose to Â£100 per ton, and this very profitable trade soon attracted new settlers, for thirty-three years later, when the inabitants numbered 700, the Governor of Jamaica reported to the King of England that the settlement of Belize 'had increased H.M.'s Customs and the national commerce more than any of H.M's Colonies.'
